resources.string:
Hello world! This six hour Classical Music arrangement features some of the best piano Sonatas by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart , the famous Austrian composer and pianist.
It\'s the perfect playlist for studying, relaxing, homework, video gaming, sleeping, babies, deep relaxation and mediation and some use it as elevator or hotel lobby and lounge music! Long music for meditation and relaxation. Zen music for meditation, Guided Meditation. Meditation Music, Soothing Music, Calming Music, Relax Piano Music.
